posts.postText: Hey all, just thought I would introduce myself, my names rigo I live in California, I play league of legends and of course garrys mod, I'm in another clan named unifiedgamerz which is based off multiple games. And my fav server is the TTT server
Welcome to our forums! I'm glad you like are servers! Do you really like any other certain gamemodes?
